## OptionItem interface

Definition of option item in single selection or multiple selection

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OptionItem 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cliName?](./teamsfx-api.optionitem.cliname.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> CLI display name. CLI will use <code>cliName</code> as display name, and use <code>id</code> instead if <code>cliName</code> is undefined. |
|  [data?](./teamsfx-api.optionitem.data.md) | unknown | <i>(Optional)</i> customized user data, which is not displayed |
|  [description?](./teamsfx-api.optionitem.description.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> short description |
|  [detail?](./teamsfx-api.optionitem.detail.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> detailed description |
|  [id](./teamsfx-api.optionitem.id.md) | string | unique identifier of the option item in the option list |
|  [label](./teamsfx-api.optionitem.label.md) | string | display name |
